name: Transaction screen display features

testSteps.description: 1: Transaction screen display features ({options=the transactions are grouped by period})

children.description: Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user observes the transactions screen
And the following are displayed the transactions are grouped by period:
And if there are no transactions for a period group, then this group is not displayed

testSteps.description: 2: Transaction screen display features ({options=the search field is empty and enabled})

children.description: Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user observes the transactions screen
And the following are displayed the search field is empty and enabled:
And if there are no transactions for a period group, then this group is not displayed

testSteps.description: 3: Transaction screen display features ({options=the search field contains a search icon on the left side})

children.description: Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user observes the transactions screen
And the following are displayed the search field contains a search icon on the left side:
And if there are no transactions for a period group, then this group is not displayed

testSteps.description: 4: Transaction screen display features ({options=the search field displays a hinted search text "Search Transactions"})

children.description: Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user observes the transactions screen
And the following are displayed the search field displays a hinted search text "Search Transactions":
And if there are no transactions for a period group, then this group is not displayed

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to search for transactions in the EUDI Wallet
  So that I can find the transactions to match my search request

title: Transaction screen display features

values: the transactions are grouped by period
the search field is empty and enabled
the search field contains a search icon on the left side
the search field displays a hinted search text "Search Transactions"
